messages.message: Hey all! What is the oldest version of k8s that we support?
Well, there are differences between versions - so probably something we should track.
agreed, we need to track this and test versions - customers always ask this question in customer-hosted environments

we do track k8s versions and their point in time add-on/chart versions here (https://github.com/instabase/terraform-modules/blob/main/compositions/saas/locals.tf#L154) and here (https://github.com/instabase/terraform-modules/blob/main/compositions/saas/locals.tf#L194)

in theory, a customer should be able to deploy to any k8s version with these chart versions and have a working cluster. To my knowledge, since k8s version 1.26 there havent been any product-side changes required to maintain compatibility with k8s
But mostly wondering bc 1.31 is EoL soon

1.30 is end of standard support Jul 23

1.31 is end of standard support in Nov 26
We are fully on 1.31 at the moment.

in Aug we plan to upgrade to 1.32
